amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to plan for or carry out a furlough of a dual status military technician (as defined in section 10216 of title 10, United States Code).
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 27 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds to plan for or carry out a furlough of a dual status military technician.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nugent amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nugent amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A053) offered by Mr. Nugent.
